introduction.name: Nevzat Doğukan Karabiberoğlu
introduction.description: Hi, I’m Nevzat Dogukan. I’m a frontend developer. If you are looking for a developer to handle all over your products, let's meet!

aboutMe.title: About Me
paragraphs: My career started in the retail sector (Apple). I continued my journey with Sky Aviation, the only hovercraft manufacturer in Turkey.
I continue my career journey with E-Garaj, Turkey's first and only electric car service and sales center. I am a problem solver, analytical thinker, managing operations and continuing to learn.

items.title: Workintech
items.description: A simple, customizable, minimal setup cookie plugin that allows your users to select which cookies to accept or decline. This was created with vanilla JS, SCSS and Parcel Bundler and is available as a NPM package and the git repository makes any type of customization to code and themes possible.
